alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 4:55AM EDT until June 03 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TO 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...One to locally two feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson, Eastern Essex and Eastern Union Counties. In New York, Richmond (Staten Island), Kings (Brooklyn), Southern Queens and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM to 10 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Minor to localized moderate flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor to localized moderate flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The best chance for localized moderate will be across the south shore back bays of southern Queens and Southern Nassau. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.1 FT, MODERATE 8.4 FT, MAJOR 9.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.9 FT, MAJOR 4.0 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/08 AM 5.7/ 6.2 0.2/ 0.7 0.7/ 1.1 0-1 NONE 03/09 PM 7.7/ 8.2 2.2/ 2.7 1.4/ 1.9 1 MINOR 04/09 AM 5.9/ 6.4 0.4/ 0.9 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 04/09 PM 7.0/ 7.5 1.5/ 2.0 0.5/ 1.0 1 MINOR NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
